name: Canoe Appalachia to New Orleans, Big River Stories
blurb: Canoeing from West Virginia to Louisiana down the Mississippi River to reveal the character of this classy lady.

name: The Bridger Mountains Aerial Photo Catalog
blurb: High resolution aerial images of the Bridger Mountains shot from the east.  Will benefit skiers, climbers, hikers, and hunters.

name: Mystery Postcards: A Mystery Waiting to be Solved
blurb: A treasure map meets a postcard: receive a postcard in the mail and figure out the location from the clues in the message.

name: A Polaroid Diary from Japan
blurb: Help me document my first year living in Japan on a Polaroid photo-diary and receive an original of your choice in exchange!

name: Photo Exhibit of the Vietnam War from the Front Lines
blurb: An exhibit displaying some of the most intimate and iconic images captured during the Vietnam War by elite US Army Combat photographers

name: The Spine of Russia
blurb: Two photojournalists – one American, one Russian – on a 3700 km quest to capture the heart of Russia in a beautiful photo book.

name: I Love Huntington, West Virginia
blurb: A fine hardcover coffee table book and 31 collector cards about Huntington, West Virginia.

name: San Francisco Neon Book
blurb: A photography book and guide to the creative legacy of neon survivors and lost icons of small businesses in San Francisco.

name: Wild Atlantic Way
blurb: Wild Atlantic Way - Ein 300 Seiten starker Bildband über Irlands spektakuläre Küstenstraße.

name: England to Asia | Alex Stevenson
blurb: I am taking my love for photography and passion for travel to the next level - with a 5 month trip to Vietnam, Cambodia and Thailand!

name: Border Perspective: Stories from the U.S. & Mexico Border
blurb: Documenting stories & photographing the existing border fence between Brownsville, TX & San Diego, CA.

name: Fearless // The Story Of A Female Surf Photographer
blurb: She faces her fears to follow a dream - a dream to photograph the most beautiful and terrifying waves around the world.

name: Three years through the Arctic Circle
blurb: My name is Alejandro de Paz, I am 25 years old and I am a freelance photographer of travel and landscapes passionate of the mountain.

name: Wild Open Roads: A photographic journey home!
blurb: In 2016 I journeyed to my birth town of San Diego, taking over 575 negatives. I hope to develop these for my upcoming art exhibition.

name: GHOSTS OF THE WEST - Old West Ghost Towns Book
blurb: A unique photo book about the ghost towns of the Old West by the writer-director of Best Documentary Award winner "Ghosts of the West"

name: VENDING MACHINES OF JAPAN zine
blurb: A zine presenting a collection of photos highlighting the proliferation of vending machines in Japan.

name: "Walking Flagstaff" with photographer George Breed
blurb: A book for those who want to experience this mountain town (and its back alleys and byways) through my photos and words.

name: The Noble Path
blurb: South East Asia Hardcover Book and Photography Exhibition launching Summer 2020 in New York City.

name: ARABIAN TRANSFER - a PHOTOBOOK by Michele Nastasi
blurb: A novel journey through six cities of the Arabian Peninsula: Abu Dhabi, Doha, Dubai, Kuwait City, Manama, Riyadh

name: NO1HERE: London's Underground Picture Book
blurb: "No 1 Here" is a black & white picture-book set in London 2021, during the global pandemic and quarantine exploring the Underground

name: mónos a photobook by Vincenzo Pagliuca
blurb: Images of solitary, oneiric houses from the Southern Italian Apennines by the photographer Vincenzo Pagliuca.
